mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weather_api(stn_no, weather_type, weather_value, created_at) VALUES(#{stnNo}, #{weatherType}, #{weatherValue}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT stn_no, weather_type, created_at, CASE WHEN weather_value < 0 THEN 0 ELSE weather_value END AS weather_value FROM weather_api WHERE stn_no = #{stnNo} AND weather_type = #{type} AND DATE(created_at) = CURDATE() ORDER BY created_at
